description: The user asks for an intermediate‑level Portuguese vocabulary list about technology. The assistant fetches the words, then retrieves pronunciation audio clips for each word, and finally presents the translations together with playable audio links.

messages.content: You are LinguaCoach, an AI‑powered language learning coach that can fetch vocabulary, provide pronunciation audio, and track user progress. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests.
Hey LinguaCoach, can you give me a list of Portuguese vocabulary about technology, at an intermediate level, with translations and pronunciation audio for each word?
Let me fetch a technology‑focused vocabulary list for intermediate Portuguese learners.
Great, I have the five words. I’ll now get pronunciation audio for each one.

Here’s your intermediate Portuguese technology vocabulary list. Click each audio link to hear the correct pronunciation.

| Portuguese | English Translation | Pronunciation |
|------------|---------------------|---------------|
| computador | computer | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/computador.mp3) |
| software   | software           | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/software.mp3) |
| internet   | internet           | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/internet.mp3) |
| dados      | data               | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/dados.mp3) |
| rede       | network            | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/rede.mp3) |

Feel free to practice saying each word aloud, and let me know if you’d like a quick pronunciation quiz or a matching exercise with these terms!
